alert.note: Alert for Richland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 18 at 2:23AM MST until January 18 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 35 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Richland County. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 11 AM MST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
